data.pageTitle: About Graziano Casto - Developer Relations Engineer and CNCF TAG Tech Lead
data.pageDescription: Learn more about Graziano Casto, a Developer Relations Engineer at Mia-Platform, Kubernetes v1.35 Release Comms Lead, CNCF TAG Developer Experience Tech Lead, and Cloud Native Days Italy organizer.

mainEntity.name: Graziano Casto
mainEntity.description: Graziano Casto is a passionate Developer Relations Engineer at Mia-Platform, Kubernetes v1.35 Release Comms Lead, CNCF TAG Developer Experience Tech Lead, and Cloud Native Days Italy organizer, specializing in Platform Engineering, Developer Experience, and Cloud Native technologies.
